Disclaimer1: Access and further use of this panel will log client actions
Disclaimer2: Get your client id and password from a admin to login the first time
Disclaimer3: DO NOT set your password to anything used for other secure logins. This includes but is not limited to email, steam and other websites
Disclaimer4: Lost password can not be recovered. Contact an administrator for reset
Disclaimer5: Do not share your password with other clients or friends
Disclaimer6: Reloading the panel will reset your security credentials, requiring you to sign in again
Disclaimer7: Reloading too often without logging in will put you in timeout for 10 minutes
